subject: JUnit Test case
msgSnippet: Hi, This is my positive testcase. is there any make sense of below statement in following testcase? is it require? assertTrue(e instanceof CustomerException ||
messageBody:
Hi,
This is my positive testcase. is there any make sense of below
statement in following testcase?
is it require?

assertTrue(e instanceof CustomerException || e instanceof
CompanyException);

Kindly provide your comments,

/**
* Tests addCompaniesList() of Companies Loader class
* for Sucess
*
*/
public void testAddCompaniesListCompany() {
try {
List idList = customerDetails.listCustomerIds();
assertNotNull(idList);
for(Iterator iter = idList.iterator(); iter.hasNext();) {
String customerId = iter.next().toString();
CustomerType customerType =
customerDetails.getCustomerDetails(customerId);
List coShortNameList = companyDetails.getCompaniesList
(customerId);
assertNotNull(coShortNameList);
for (int j = 0; j < coShortNameList.size(); j++) {
String coShortName = coShortNameList.get
(j).toString();
CompanyType companyType
= companyDetails.getCompanyDetails(customerId,
coShortName);
companyLoader.addCompany(companyType, customerId);

String customerKey =
ACHHelper.Database.SELECT_CUSTOMER_KEY
+ customerId + "'";
String cKey = ACHHelper.instance().select
(customerKey);

boolean isCustomerExist = ACHHelper.instance
().isIdExist
(selectCustomer + cKey);
assertTrue(isCustomerExist);
}
}

} catch (Exception e) {
assertTrue(e instanceof CustomerException || e instanceof
CompanyException);
e.printStackTrace();
fail();
}
}
